text: Andrzej Skowroński (16 November 1953 - 10 December 2020) was a Polish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born in Kraków, Poland. Skowroński died on 10 December 2020 in Kraków at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish rowers Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Kraków
title: Andrzej Skowroński
